sentences.sContent: One of the greatest utilitarians was Claude Helvetius.
sentences.sCn: 最伟大的功利主义者之一是克劳德·爱尔维修。

remMethod.val: 来自utilit (y) (效用) + arian (…的) → 功利的

trans.tranCn: 功利的；功利主义的；实利的
trans.tranOther: intended to be useful and practical rather than attractive or comfortable
A utilitarian is someone with utilitarian views
